repo_notes.content: Dataplane is a multi-runtime workflow orchestrator. Focus documentation on the core modules: dpapp/, cmd/, pkg/, and internal/.

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.purpose: Explain the Dataplane orchestration flow, main services, and how the workflow engine interacts with connectors and the API layer.

pages.title: Workflow Engine
pages.purpose: Describe pipeline execution logic, DAG scheduling, and job runners in the internal/engine/ directory.

pages.title: Connectors
pages.purpose: Document connector architecture in dpapp/connectors/ including integration logic and runtime isolation.

pages.title: API Services
pages.purpose: Outline REST and gRPC service implementations in cmd/api/ and their interface with frontend components.

pages.title: Frontend Module
pages.purpose: Describe frontend UI components and communication flow with backend APIs.
